body.u: Thought I'd end up with Sean Big Sean But he wasn't a match Wrote some songs about Ricky Ricky Alvarez Now I listen and laugh Even almost got married And for Pete Pete Davidson, I'm so thankful Wish I could say, "Thank you" to Malcolm Mac Miller 'Cause he was an angel One taught me love One taught me patience And one taught me pain Now, I'm so amazing Say I've loved and I've lost But that's not what I see So, look what I got Look what you taught me And for that, I say Thank you, next (next) Thank you, next (next) Thank you, next I'm so fuckin' grateful for my ex Thank you,
